document_data.name: Curse of Impending Blades
document_data.mainbody: '''''Curse of impending blades''''' was a [[necromancy]] [[spell]] from the 2{{nd}} circle of magic that made one's enemies vulnerable to damage. The spell was granted to [[ranger]]s and was usable by [[bard]]s, [[sorcerer]]s, and [[mage]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell's target, within {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} from the caster, found themselves having a difficult time of avoiding attacks and seemingly, stumbling into danger and the enemy's blade. The spell's effects were not affected by ''[[dispel magic]]'', but could be remove via ''[[remove curse]],'' ''[[break enchantment]]'', ''[[limited wish]]'', ''[[miracle]]'', or ''[[wish]]'' spells. ''Curse of impending blades'' lated for two minutes and was prolonged per minute with each level of arcane mastery. The spell's distance also increased with the caster's magical prowess.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Somatic component|somatic]], [[verbal component|verbal]], and [[material component]]s. The material component was a [[leather]] thong, pierced with an [[iron]] [[nail]].
